snippet: About a dozen Jewish plaintiffs, mostly young professionals, squared off in court against Tehmina Adaya over a charge that she used a harsh profanity.
abstract: Tehmina Adaya, Muslim owner of the Hotel Shangri-La in Santa Monica, Calif, defends herself in court against an anti-Semitism charge; she is accused by a dozen Jewish plantiffs of using a harsh profanity in ordering her staff to clear either the hotel or its pool of Jewish party guests on July 11, 2010.
lead_paragraph: About a dozen Jewish plaintiffs, mostly young professionals, squared off in court against Tehmina Adaya over a charge that she used a harsh profanity.

headline.seo: Muslim Hotel Owner Fights Charge of Anti-Semitism
headline.main: Muslim Hotel Owner in California Defends Herself Against Anti-Semitism Charge
headline.print_headline: Muslim Hotel Owner in California Defends Herself Against Anti-Semitism Charge
